reviewText: Lynne Young is my cousin. I'm so, so very proud of her!
If you need a reminder of all that's important in this world, this is the story for you. I felt moved and inspired by the story telling. The production was great and this is definitely a must see.
I am totally amazed and at awe with the story, the production, and the message. Anyone who takes time to watch "I Promise" will be inspired and filled with joy!

I had the pleasure of meeting Ms. Young in person and was in awe of her story but when I viewed her documentary I was overcome with emotion. Her journey with breast cancer is one to remember and learn from. I commend her for having the courage to share her story and I thank her for having a heart to spread awareness about this generational disease.
Inspiring story for anyone facing breast cancer.
